title: Hour 2: The Real (Early) MVP
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, and Marcus Spears debate who they believe to be the NFL's (early) MVP frontrunner. Tim Legler joins the show to break down tonight's Eastern Conference matchup between the Nets and Bucks. It's Wednesday, which means Mad Dog is here to tell us what has him so angry this week. The crew debates which QB is more trustworthy: Kyler Murray or Kirk Cousins? Plus, which World Series-bound team had the better story this season?

itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Is there a clear NFL MVP frontrunner?
